Make the Sales Management System available to members Allow members to lookup other existing sales prospects Make the Sales Lead Programs available to members Make the Project Collaboration System available to members Updated ACTIVE MEMBERSHIPS: Each Company can have up to 3 levels of active memberships. Enter the descriptive name for each membership with the corresponding retail price and retail profit for the company if any. Leave the name blank if not used. The corresponding features are specified below. MEMBER FEATURES: Specify default options for each membership level below. ADMIN FEATURES: Specify access options for the company admin and manager levels below. PAYMENT PROCESSING INFORMATION: Specify the payment processors and account information. None Verisign Payment Tech Merchant Partners AuthorizeNet Pay Junction First Data Network Merchants Metrics Global PayPal Chain Commerce Global Payment Gateway Versa Check Legacy Texas ACH Commerce default: 10,100,250,500 Custom Fields (update first) MEMBER DEFAULTS: Access to the system can be limited by IP address (IP:), day of week (DAY:), or by time of day (TIME:). For example, IP:1.2.3 (any IP address starting with 1.2.3) --OR-- DAY:17 (weekend only) --OR-- TIME:900-1700 (9:00am - 5:00pm) Multiple limits are delimited with a semicolon. Access to Quizes can also be limited to no retakes or no answers and no retakes. Bytes Specify the Company's supported country numbers (,1,2,3,) and languages (en,English;es,Spanish) in the specified format . The specified languages must be supported by Pinnacle and must have the supporting graphics and custom pages for each language. A negative commission rate specifies a commission to be paid to the referring member(s). The whole number is the referral rate paid to the 1st level. The fractional number is the referral rate paid to the 2nd level. IDENTIFICATION QUESTIONS - you can define up to 15 custom questions for members to identify themselves. Each custom question starts on a separate line and can continue to the next line if too long. Training Manager Options MANAGER FEATURES: Specify access options for the company manager levels below. Upload a custom header (.png, .gif or .jpg file) for all web pages (600 x 100). The web page header image is scaled to 600 wide below for display purposes. Refresh the web page after uploading to view new images. Upload a custom header (.gif file) for the class certificates (500 x 69). Refresh the web page after uploading to view new images. Upload a custom header (.png file) for the mobile application (300 x 50). Refresh the web page after uploading to view new images. Upload a custom header (.png file) for the logo. Refresh the web page after uploading to view new images. Company Options Company Graphics Edit Test Upload Web Page Header Upload Certificate Header Upload Mobile Header Upload Logo
